<h3 id="X39873">X(39873) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd ANTI-CIRCUMPERP-TANGENTIAL TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (-a+b+c)*(2*a^4-(b-c)^2*a^2+(b^2+c^2)*(b-c)^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(39873) = 2*X(3056)-3*X(3058) = 3*X(11246)-4*X(24471) = 4*X(17792)-3*X(34612)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>
X(39873) lies on these lines: {1,3564}, {3,39900}, {4,39892}, {6,11}, {12,611}, {34,39871}, {55,69}, {56,6776}, {57,39878}, {120,26657}, {141,2330}, {182,5433}, {193,497}, {206,9667}, {388,5921}, {390,20080}, {496,1353}, {499,5050}, {511,6284}, {518,10950}, {524,3056}, {528,25304}, {542,3023}, {599,4995}, {613,37722}, {614,11245}, {895,12904}, {950,34379}, {999,39899}, {1319,39870}, {1350,15338}, {1351,1479}, {1428,8550}, {1469,1503}, {1478,18440}, {1837,3751}, {1858,34381}, {1992,11238}, {2099,39898}, {2175,26932}, {2854,32297}, {2886,15988}, {3057,5847}, {3086,14912}, {3242,5849}, {3295,11898}, {3583,21850}, {3585,39884}, {3614,10516}, {3620,5218}, {3629,8540}, {3763,5326}, {4293,39874}, {4302,33878}, {4459,17365}, {5039,10798}, {5093,9669}, {5204,25406}, {5217,10519}, {5252,39885}, {5298,11179}, {5480,19369}, {5710,10372}, {5845,24840}, {5965,13079}, {7173,14561}, {7741,18583}, {7951,18358}, {8593,12351}, {10385,11160}, {10535,34774}, {10752,12374}, {10753,12185}, {10754,13183}, {10755,13274}, {10759,12764}, {10766,13297}, {10832,19459}, {10833,37491}, {10896,14853}, {10955,12587}, {11180,11237}, {11246,24471}, {11376,16475}, {11393,12167}, {11509,39877}, {11579,32308}, {12428,34382}, {12588,15069}, {12835,39872}, {12836,32451}, {12896,14984}, {14982,32289}, {15171,34380}, {16496,37740}, {16541,19588}, {17635,28849}, {17792,34612}, {18954,39879}, {18955,39880}, {18956,39881}, {18957,39882}, {18958,39886}, {18959,39887}, {18960,39888}, {18961,39889}, {18962,39890}, {18963,39895}, {18964,39896}, {18965,19145}, {18966,19146}, {18967,39903}, {18995,39875}, {18996,39876}, {24837,32029}, {26686,39141}, {35768,39893}, {35769,39894}, {37735,38040}</p>
<p>
X(39873) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (7354, 1469), (39897, 1)<br>
X(39873) = X(69)-of-Mandart-incircle-triangle<br>
X(39873) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (6, 12589, 11), (141, 2330, 5432), (388, 5921, 39891), (611, 1352, 12), (999, 39899, 39901), (10925, 19029, 11), (10926, 19030, 11)<br>
</p>
